name: Warm Wurm
description:
Snake on a planet! Eat hot things to go faster and get higher score, but beware of overheating! Relieve your struggle in heat by eating cold things instead, but don't freeze to death either!

Made during ASM Game Jam 2018, 2 - 5 Aug 2018. Theme: Hot Hot Hot

Gameplay video: 

Team:

Code: Henri Niva

Art: Kimmo Seitz, Maria Davidjuk, Juho Korhonen

Audio: Kimmo Seitz

Voice Acting (LAN party guests): RantaPihanKauha, Marko Haaja, noobslayer69

Sources: https://github.com/Hegemege/hot-snake
